globals.title: Tec Gaps Calculator
globals.description: Page to calculate gaps and glass measurements for the installation of Tec products
globals.alert: The calculator's exclusive purpose is to support the interpretation and application of the formulas presented in the product manual. The accuracy of the data and measurements entered in the tables is the user's entire responsibility.

products.name: VDPO 2 DOORS
products.title: Gap calculation for VDPO 2 Doors
products.subtitle: Installation for tempered glass
products.description: Model without the use of the side door profile with a built-in lock

content.title: Number of glasses
content.panelsDescription: Enter the number of panels to be installed between the doors here.
content.doorsDescription: For this model, we have doors on both sides! Number not editable.

content.title: Lock discount
content.description: Here you add the extra measurement, per door, for the lock adjustment.

text.text: If you want to use a handle or other type of accessory, you can use larger gaps (e.g., 230mm, 250mm...) per door!

content.label: Door
